Key Match Events: Joel Embiid struggled in his first game, failing to catch a rhythm.
The 76ers lost 111-99 to the New York Knicks in Joel Embiid's season debut.
Embiid seemed gassed during a span in the first quarter and asked to be subbed out.
Pre-Game Insights: Embiid was out managing his left knee, which kept him out for six games.
The NBA suspended him for the last three games after engaging in a physical altercation with a reporter.
Post-Match Reflections: Embiid didn't have the return he would have hoped for.
The 76ers lost 111-99 in his first game, dropping to 0-1 in the 2024 NBA Emirates Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid made his season debut against the New York Knicks on Tuesday in the 2024 Emirates NBA Cup opener.
Embiid was out for nine games due to injury and suspension.
Embiid set up his new teammate, Paul George, from the elbow in his first game.
Others: Embiid's stats vs. Knicks: PTS - 13, REB - 3, AST - 5, STL - 0, BLK - 0, TO - 1, FG - 2-11, 3-PT FG - 1-5, FTM - 8-8, +/- - -7, MIN - 26:25.
